changelog.change_log:
Update V1.0.6 - Patch Notes

Hi everyone,
CityAvenger has released an important update: The input method adds an oculus 3dof controller. However, the 3dof handle has fewer keys, so downloading tools are not supported. We will improve the operation of the 3dof handle in subsequent updates.

Important Update: Support Oculus controller

-Bullet Time: Rotating the handle can make the game screen enter the cool bullet time, the sense of the movie blockbuster.
-Character Jumping: Tap the touchpad to jump high, and the battle on the roof is completely open!
-Grenade Throwing: Raise the handle and press the trigger. The grenade can knock down a bunch of enemies.
-New tutorial: animation guide, operation is no longer lost!

Chesstar

1.Added “Jump” , now you can press button 2 to jump. Using jump to jump up buildings, crates, vehicles and anything you can imagine.
2.Added “Bullet time”, now you can initiate/cease bullet time by touching right stick. In bullet time, both you and enemy moves in half speed.
3.Added “Roll”, now you can roll forward/backward/left/right with D-Pad, which enables you to move some distance in a instant.
4.Now you can ride tank/mammoth tank/helicopter and apache, enjoy it!
5.We added 6 level.
6.The games’ camera moving method has been optimized, which will prevent VR sickness.
7.The games’ UI has been optimized to fix judder issue, which will prevent VR sickness.
8.Fixed some bugs and improved the game performance.
Support some other gamepad such as OUYA,NVIDIA Shield,Moga Pro, etc.
A lot of optimization to ensure a 60fps experience.
Fix some graphic problem in some levels.
